image.alt: JB Orthodontics team and patients smiling together in clinic

paragraphs.text: Orthodontics is not just about straightening teeth, it’s about rekindling self-confidence in each patient. This is the core of JB Orthodontics. Dr. John Bibko and his caring team take pride in connecting with each patient on his or her orthodontic journey.

Dr. John Bibko is committed to providing superior results and optimal service. He crafts uniquely customized treatment plans so each smile is truly stunning and is a member of the American Association of Orthodontists, Northeastern Society of Orthodontists, and the American Dental Association.

og_meta.title: Home - JB Orthodontics
og_meta.description: JB Orthodontics provides orthodontic care in Norwalk, Stamford, and Westport, offering braces, Invisalign®, retainers, and personalized treatment plans.

image.alt: JB Orthodontics team smiling together in the office

paragraphs.text: Orthodontics is not just about straightening teeth, it is about rekindling self-confidence in each patient. At JB Orthodontics we begin every plan by listening, so treatment fits your life as well as your smile.
Dr. John Bibko and the team design customized treatment plans for every patient, blending clinical expertise with modern technology to create outcomes that look great and feel comfortable.
We offer a full range of orthodontic options for children, teens, and adults, delivered with clear communication, gentle care, and scheduling that works for busy families.
Above all, our goal is to build lasting relationships so each patient leaves confident in their smile and confident in their care.

image.alt: Dr. John Bibko with the JB Orthodontics team

paragraphs.text: Dr. John Bibko leads JB Orthodontics with a patient-first approach. He believes orthodontic care should restore confidence as well as alignment. Dr. Bibko and his team focus on comfortable, individualized treatment plans and clear communication at every visit.
He takes pride in delivering consistent, carefully planned care that addresses both function and form, and he works closely with each patient to make the process simple and predictable.

image.alt: Dr. John Bibko consulting with a patient in the office

paragraphs.text: Dr. Bibko is an active member of the American Association of Orthodontists, the Northeastern Society of Orthodontists, and the American Dental Association. These affiliations reflect his commitment to ongoing education and current best practices in orthodontics.

Outside the office Dr. Bibko enjoys connecting with patients and families in the community and supporting a healthy lifestyle. He values teamwork and encourages patients to stay engaged throughout their treatment so results feel meaningful and long-lasting.

image.alt: Dr. John Bibko and team smiling

slides.alt: Single patient chair and treatment room

paragraphs.text: JB Orthodontics supports professional engagement in the region and displays affiliations with the American Association of Orthodontists, the American Dental Association, and the Northeastern Society of Orthodontists. Specific event write-ups or recent sponsorships were not included in the uploaded files, but these memberships reflect our focus on staying current and connected to the profession.

og_meta.title: About Us | JB Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Learn about JB Orthodontics, Dr. John Bibko, and the team's patient-centered approach to personalized orthodontic care in Norwalk, Stamford, and Westport.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at Lakeshore Orthodontics front desk

paragraphs.text: Welcome to JB Orthodontics. Your first visit is a friendly, comprehensive exam where you’ll meet Dr. John Bibko and our team, get a full oral evaluation with any needed X-rays, and talk through the treatment options that fit your goals.

We’ll review your medical history, answer questions about timing and expected results, and outline financing and insurance options. If you’d like to schedule by phone, call our Norwalk, Stamford, or Westport offices and our team will help you pick a convenient time.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: We accept most major insurance plans and will file claims electronically when possible to make billing easier for you.
Flexible payment plans are available and our treatment coordinator will work with you to find an option that fits your budget and treatment goals.
Before your appointment, you can request an appointment online or complete our new patient intake so we have basic information on file ahead of time.
Prefer to speak with someone? Call any of our offices: Norwalk (203) 866-7806, Stamford (203) 252-2181, Westport (203) 293-9595.

image.alt: Patient filling out orthodontic health history forms online

seo.page_description: Start orthodontic care with JB Orthodontics. Learn what to expect on your first visit, access the appointment request form, and schedule a consultation in Norwo
seo.page_keywords: orthodontics, first visit, appointment, JB Orthodontics, Norwalk, Stamford, Westport

og_meta.title: Get Started | JB Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Start orthodontic care with JB Orthodontics. Learn what to expect on your first visit, access the appointment request form, and schedule a consultation in Norwo

paragraphs.text: Braces remain a reliable solution for many alignment needs. At JB Orthodontics we offer options for children, teens, and adults, tailoring each plan to the patient’s goals and lifestyle.
Durable and cost-effective, metal braces use brackets and wires to move teeth safely and predictably over time.
Ceramic brackets blend with tooth color for a subtler look while still providing effective tooth movement.

image.alt: Two stylish smiling teens taking a selfie with braces

paragraphs.text: Starting orthodontic care early can guide jaw growth and prevent more complex issues later. We evaluate children as recommended and recommend intervention only when it benefits long-term outcomes.

image.alt: Young patient receiving early orthodontic care

paragraphs.text: Our adolescent care focuses on effective, discreet options that fit a busy teen life. We offer choices that balance appearance, comfort, and predictable results.
Adults have excellent options today, including lower-profile brackets and ceramic systems that fit professional and personal lifestyles without sacrificing results.
Invisalign<sup>®</sup> uses clear, removable aligners and advanced 3D planning to move teeth with precision while letting you brush, floss, and eat normally.
We personalize the Invisalign<sup>®</sup> process for each patient and review the virtual treatment stages so you know what to expect.

image.alt: Close-up of clear aligners being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: Childhood treatment focuses on monitoring growth and intervening when it will reduce future complexity. Our team explains options clearly so parents can make informed decisions.
Teen treatment addresses both functional alignment and appearance, with options that let adolescents stay active and confident during care.
Adult care at our Norwalk, Stamford, and Westport offices is designed around convenience and comfort, with treatment plans that respect work and lifestyle commitments.

paragraphs.text: Find answers to common questions about treatment options, appointment scheduling, and payment plans at Lakeshore Orthodontics.

accordion.header: What orthodontic treatments do you offer?

paragraphs.text: We provide traditional braces for all ages, clear Invisalign<sup>®</sup> aligners for discreet treatment, and custom retainers to maintain your new smile.

accordion.header: At what age should my child see an orthodontist?

paragraphs.text: The American Association of Orthodontists recommends an evaluation by age 7. Early visits help us monitor development and plan for optimal outcomes.

accordion.header: How long does treatment usually take?

paragraphs.text: Treatment times vary, but most patients complete care within 12-24 months. We’ll provide a personalized timeline at your first appointment.

accordion.header: What payment and insurance options are available?

paragraphs.text: We offer flexible monthly payment plans and accept most major dental insurance carriers. Our team will guide you through coverage and financing.

accordion.header: How can I schedule an appointment?

paragraphs.text: Scheduling is easy, call or text us at 519-979-5500. We’ll find a convenient time that fits your family’s needs. You can also request an appointment through our contact form.
